thread.title: Turkey, Iran, Russia say will work for stability in Syria

title: Turkey, Iran, Russia say will work for stability in Syria
text:
Turkey, Iran, Russia say will work for stability in Syria 8:28pm BST - 01:45 
Turkey, Iran and Russia pledged on Wednesday to accelerate efforts to bring stability to Syria, underlining their joint commitment to the country a day after President Donald Trump raised the prospect of withdrawing U.S. troops.   
Turkey, Iran and Russia pledged on Wednesday to accelerate efforts to bring stability to Syria, underlining their joint commitment to the country a day after President Donald Trump raised the prospect of withdrawing U.S. troops.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/04/04/turkey-iran-russia-say-will-work-for-sta?videoId=414865084&videoChannel=13422
